data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Jinhua, Zhejiang, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jinhua, Zhejiang, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: the county of Jinhua has (about) 350,744 people who know Jesus, 74,692 people who know about him culturally, and 4,198,064 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Jinhua, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Jinhua, Zhejiang, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the She people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Jinhua to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Jinhua, Zhejiang, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the county of Jinhua, Zhejiang, China has a population of 4,623,500.

We estimate Jinhua has 350,744 people who might know Jesus, 74,692 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,198,064 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Jinhua.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
